title: Bank Angle Indicators

body.body: Always replace the bank angle indicators before they are worn to their maximum limit.
Use of a motorcycle with bank angle indicators worn beyond the maximum limit will allow the motorcycle to be banked to an unsafe angle.
Banking to an unsafe angle may lead to loss of motorcycle control which could result in serious injury or death.
Bank angle indicators are located on the rider's footrests.

Bank angle indicators must be replaced when they have worn down to the maximum wear limit. The maximum wear limit is shown by a groove on the bank angle indicator. Regularly check the bank angle indicators for wear.
